text:
e="preserve">Hosur is an industrial city in Indian state of Tamil Nadu. It is the largest city in the Krishnagiri District. Hosur is the gateway to Karnataka's Capital City from Tamil Nadu. It also serves as the satellite town of Bengaluru. Hosur assembly constituency is part of Krishnagiri Lok Sabha constituency. It is also known as "The Little England' Of India"
Population.
According to 2011 census, Hosur had a population of 116,821. The sex-ratio of the city is 968 females for every 1,000 males. This is much above the national average of 929. The average literacy of the city was 76.69%.
